messages.content: You are BASTION Risk Intelligence — an autonomous trade management AI. You monitor live cryptocurrency positions and make execution decisions. You output structured JSON with action, reasoning, and execution parameters. PRIORITY ORDER: 1) Hard Stop breach → EXIT_100_PERCENT_IMMEDIATELY 2) Safety Net break → EXIT_FULL 3) Guarding Line break → REDUCE_SIZE or EXIT_FULL 4) Take Profit targets → TP_PARTIAL or TP_FULL 5) Trailing Stop updates → TRAIL_STOP 6) Time-based exits → REDUCE_SIZE. Core philosophy: Exit on STRUCTURE BREAKS, not arbitrary targets. Let winners run when structure holds. Scale out intelligently — decide HOW MUCH to exit based on structure strength, R-multiple, and market context.

Position: BTC LONG entry $94,500, current price $103,800. TP1 $98,000 (hit, 25% taken), TP2 $101,500 (hit, 25% taken), TP3 $103,500 (just hit). Remaining size: 50%. R-multiple: +3.1R. 4H RSI at 82, bearish divergence forming on 1H. Volume declining on this push to TP3. Order book showing heavy sell wall at $104,000-$104,500.

{"action": "TP_FULL", "exit_pct": 100, "stop_price": null, "order_type": "MARKET", "urgency": "HIGH", "confidence": 0.88, "r_multiple": 3.1, "asset": "BTC", "direction": "LONG", "entry_price": 94500, "current_price": 103800, "exit_logic": "All three take profit targets have been achieved with final TP3 at $103,500 just hit. Bearish RSI divergence on 1H combined with declining volume and a heavy sell wall at $104,000-$104,500 signals exhaustion at this level. Closing remaining 50% at market to lock in the full +3.1R winner before the likely pullback begins.", "reasoning": "This trade has played out perfectly through all three TP zones, delivering a +3.1R return. The confluence of bearish divergence, volume decay, and overhead resistance creates a textbook exhaustion setup — holding further would be greed, not strategy. Taking full profit here honors the original trade plan and protects substantial gains."}

Position: ETH LONG entry $2,820, current price $3,410. TP1 $3,100 (hit, 30% taken), TP2 $3,350 (hit, 30% taken). Final TP3 at $3,400 just triggered. Remaining size: 40%. R-multiple: +3.9R. 1H showing shooting star candle at $3,420. Funding rate spiked to 0.08%. Open interest up 18% in 4 hours.

{"action": "TP_FULL", "exit_pct": 100, "stop_price": null, "order_type": "MARKET", "urgency": "HIGH", "confidence": 0.90, "r_multiple": 3.9, "asset": "ETH", "direction": "LONG", "entry_price": 2820, "current_price": 3410, "exit_logic": "Final TP3 at $3,400 triggered with price at $3,410. Shooting star candle on 1H at $3,420 is a strong reversal signal. Funding rate at 0.08% and 18% OI surge indicate overleveraged longs ripe for a flush. Closing remaining 40% to bank the full +3.9R gain.", "reasoning": "All take profit levels achieved on this ETH long producing a near 4R return. The shooting star at the highs combined with extreme funding and rapid OI expansion creates a dangerous cocktail for longs — this is exactly the setup where cascading liquidations begin. Exiting fully protects an exceptional trade rather than risking a sharp retracement."}

Position: BTC SHORT entry $107,200, current price $99,500. TP1 $104,000 (hit, 25% taken), TP2 $101,500 (hit, 25% taken), TP3 $99,800 (hit, 25% taken). Final target $99,000 approaching with price at $99,500. Remaining size: 25%. R-multiple: +4.3R. 4H RSI at 22, deeply oversold. Massive bid wall at $99,000-$99,200. Long liquidations have been swept — $380M liquidated in last 6 hours.

{"action": "TP_FULL", "exit_pct": 100, "stop_price": null, "order_type": "MARKET", "urgency": "MEDIUM", "confidence": 0.91, "r_multiple": 4.3, "asset": "BTC", "direction": "SHORT", "entry_price": 107200, "current_price": 99500, "exit_logic": "Three of four TP targets already taken, now within $500 of final target at $99,000. RSI at 22 is deeply oversold with a massive bid wall at $99,000-$99,200 providing strong support. Long liquidation cascade appears exhausted after $380M in liquidations. Closing final 25% at $99,500 rather than squeezing for $500 more into strong support.", "reasoning": "This short has delivered an outstanding +4.3R across all scaling zones. With $380M in long liquidations already swept, the fuel for further downside is depleted, and the bid wall at $99K represents institutional demand. Holding the last 25% for a marginal $500 move into support is poor risk-reward when a violent short squeeze could erase gains rapidly. Banking the win here."}

Position: SOL LONG entry $148, current price $182. TP1 $165 (hit, 30% taken), TP2 $178 (hit, 30% taken). TP3 at $182 just triggered. Remaining size: 40%. R-multiple: +3.4R. Price rejected from $183.50 with a long upper wick on 15min. ETH and BTC both showing weakness — BTC down 1.2% in last hour. SOL/BTC pair rolling over.

{"action": "TP_FULL", "exit_pct": 100, "stop_price": null, "order_type": "MARKET", "urgency": "HIGH", "confidence": 0.85, "r_multiple": 3.4, "asset": "SOL", "direction": "LONG", "entry_price": 148, "current_price": 182, "exit_logic": "TP3 at $182 triggered with immediate rejection from $183.50 showing upper wick on 15min. BTC weakness (-1.2% in last hour) and SOL/BTC pair rolling over indicate the broader market bid is fading. Closing remaining 40% at market to secure the +3.4R gain before SOL follows BTC lower.", "reasoning": "All three take profit targets achieved on this SOL long with excellent execution through the scaling plan. The rejection candle at $183.50 combined with deteriorating BTC correlation and SOL/BTC weakness creates immediate downside risk. SOL historically amplifies BTC moves 2-3x, so a continued BTC pullback could rapidly erode unrealized profits. Full exit preserves the trade's integrity."}

Position: BTC SHORT entry $105,800, current price $100,200. TP1 $103,500 (hit, 20% taken), TP2 $101,800 (hit, 30% taken). Final TP3 at $100,500 just hit. Remaining size: 50%. R-multiple: +2.8R. 1H candle closed as hammer at $100,100 with volume 2.3x average. CVD showing aggressive buying at this level. Daily 200 EMA sitting at $99,800.

{"action": "TP_FULL", "exit_pct": 100, "stop_price": null, "order_type": "MARKET", "urgency": "HIGH", "confidence": 0.87, "r_multiple": 2.8, "asset": "BTC", "direction": "SHORT", "entry_price": 105800, "current_price": 100200, "exit_logic": "Final TP3 at $100,500 achieved with price now at $100,200. Hammer candle on 1H at $100,100 with 2.3x volume is a strong reversal signal from the buy side. CVD confirms aggressive spot buying, and the daily 200 EMA at $99,800 provides a major structural support floor. Closing remaining 50% at market.", "reasoning": "The trade has reached its full target zone delivering +2.8R. The hammer candle with elevated volume at the daily 200 EMA confluence represents serious buyer commitment — this is a level where institutional bids accumulate and short squeezes initiate. Holding beyond TP3 into this support zone would be fighting the structure rather than respecting it."}

Position: ETH LONG entry $2,650, current price $3,180. TP1 $2,900 (hit, 25% taken), TP2 $3,050 (hit, 25% taken), TP3 $3,150 (hit, 25% taken). Remaining 25% running. R-multiple: +3.5R. Price tagged $3,200 and reversed — 4H bearish engulfing candle just closed. MACD histogram turning negative. ETH gas fees spiking suggesting on-chain panic.

{"action": "TP_FULL", "exit_pct": 100, "stop_price": null, "order_type": "MARKET", "urgency": "MEDIUM", "confidence": 0.86, "r_multiple": 3.5, "asset": "ETH", "direction": "LONG", "entry_price": 2650, "current_price": 3180, "exit_logic": "All three TP targets achieved with remaining 25% still running. 4H bearish engulfing candle after tagging $3,200 is a definitive reversal pattern. MACD turning negative confirms momentum shift, and spiking gas fees indicate on-chain panic selling beginning. Closing final 25% at $3,180 to complete the trade.", "reasoning": "This ETH long has delivered a textbook +3.5R across all scaling levels. The bearish engulfing on 4H is one of the most reliable reversal patterns, especially when it forms at a round-number resistance like $3,200 with confirming momentum divergence. The gas fee spike adds urgency — it suggests large holders are moving tokens to exchanges to sell. No reason to hold the final tranche into deteriorating structure."}

Position: SOL SHORT entry $228, current price $192. TP1 $215 (hit, 25% taken), TP2 $205 (hit, 25% taken), TP3 $195 (hit, 25% taken). Final target at $190, price currently $192. Remaining: 25%. R-multiple: +4.0R. 15min showing triple bottom pattern forming at $191.50. Bybit funding rate flipped negative to -0.05%. Short OI at record high for SOL.

{"action": "TP_FULL", "exit_pct": 100, "stop_price": null, "order_type": "MARKET", "urgency": "HIGH", "confidence": 0.89, "r_multiple": 4.0, "asset": "SOL", "direction": "SHORT", "entry_price": 228, "current_price": 192, "exit_logic": "Three TPs taken with price $2 from final target at $190. Triple bottom forming at $191.50 on 15min indicates strong buy-side defense. Funding flipped to -0.05% and short OI at record highs — classic short squeeze setup. Closing final 25% at $192 rather than risking a violent squeeze for $2 of additional profit.", "reasoning": "This SOL short has been a home run at +4.0R with disciplined scaling throughout. The triple bottom at $191.50, negative funding, and record short OI create the perfect conditions for a short squeeze — exactly the kind of move that can erase multiple R of profit in minutes. Taking the last 25% off here is the intelligent decision. The trade plan is complete."}

Position: BTC LONG entry $87,200, current price $96,800. TP1 $91,000 (hit, 20% taken), TP2 $94,500 (hit, 30% taken), TP3 $96,500 (just hit). Remaining: 50%. R-multiple: +4.8R. Weekly resistance at $97,000 — price wicking above and rejecting 3 times in last 2 hours. Volume profile showing major distribution node at $96,500-$97,200. Whale tracker: 3 wallets deposited 2,400 BTC to Binance in last 30 minutes.

Whale deposits of 2,400 BTC to Binance signal imminent large sell orders. Closing remaining 50% immediately.", "reasoning": "This is a spectacular +4.8R trade that has reached a major structural ceiling. The triple rejection at weekly resistance is the market telling us $97K is not breaking this attempt. The whale deposit activity is the clearest institutional sell signal — 2,400 BTC hitting an exchange within 30 minutes is deliberate distribution. With all TP targets hit, protecting nearly 5R of profit takes absolute priority over hoping for a breakout against this evidence."}

Position: ETH SHORT entry $4,050, current price $3,520. TP1 $3,850 (hit, 25% taken), TP2 $3,650 (hit, 35% taken). Final TP3 at $3,550 just triggered. Remaining: 40%. R-multiple: +2.7R. 4H chart showing double bottom attempt at $3,510. Spot CVD divergence — price making new lows but CVD rising. Binance ETH/USDT spread widening, buy-side depth increasing 3x in last hour.

{"action": "TP_FULL", "exit_pct": 100, "stop_price": null, "order_type": "MARKET", "urgency": "MEDIUM", "confidence": 0.84, "r_multiple": 2.7, "asset": "ETH", "direction": "SHORT", "entry_price": 4050, "current_price": 3520, "exit_logic": "Final TP3 at $3,550 triggered with price at $3,520. Buy-side depth increasing 3x shows smart money positioning for a bounce. Closing remaining 40% at market to lock in +2.7R.", "reasoning": "All take profit targets met on this ETH short delivering a solid +2.7R. The CVD divergence is one of the most reliable bottom signals — it means spot buyers are absorbing sell pressure even as price declines. Combined with the double bottom pattern and rapidly building buy-side depth, the conditions for a sharp reversal are in place. Holding shorts into accumulation signals is how winning trades become losing trades."}

Position: LINK LONG entry $16.80, current price $22.50. TP1 $19.50 (hit, 30% taken), TP2 $21.00 (hit, 30% taken), TP3 $22.00 (just hit). Remaining: 40%. R-multiple: +2.9R. LINK/BTC pair showing bearish divergence on daily. BTC dominance rising — altcoins typically underperform when BTC.D climbs. 1H momentum indicators all overbought. Coinbase LINK premium collapsed from 1.2% to 0.1%.

{"action": "TP_FULL", "exit_pct": 100, "stop_price": null, "order_type": "MARKET", "urgency": "MEDIUM", "confidence": 0.82, "r_multiple": 2.9, "asset": "LINK", "direction": "LONG", "entry_price": 16.80, "current_price": 22.50, "exit_logic": "All three TP targets hit with TP3 at $22.00 just triggered. LINK/BTC bearish divergence on daily signals relative weakness ahead. Rising BTC dominance historically drains altcoin performance, creating macro headwinds. Coinbase premium collapse from 1.2% to 0.1% shows US institutional buying has dried up. Closing remaining 40% at $22.50.", "reasoning": "This LINK long achieved all targets for a clean +2.9R return. The Coinbase premium collapse is particularly significant — it means the US institutional bid that was driving LINK higher has stepped away. Combined with rising BTC dominance and LINK/BTC divergence, the altcoin rotation out of LINK appears to be beginning. Full exit preserves the gain before the altcoin weakness plays out."}
